webContent.p: When a script is found, it is run and the resulting object is cached. Coinjema provides any groovy script with some variables to work with:

ul.li: obj - The object being configured. This reference is null in the case of dynamic dependencies.
objClass - The class of the object being configured.
registry - The Registry object that provides access to shared dependency information as well as information about the root context.
injector - The DependencyFunctor object that will inject the dependency into the object.
